title: Student-Centered Mathematics Instruction Innovation Course for Higher Education Online Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Mathematical Concepts and Experiences in Applying Mathematics in Professional Contexts
context.additional_context: Need for systematic learning design to strengthen practical mathematics competencies for professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design a mathematics problem-solving module incorporating peer feedback using collaboration tools.
Learners can establish a self-directed learning plan based on a Learning Management System (LMS) and achieve an 80% or higher implementation rate.
Learners can analyze mathematical models applied to real job situations at least three times using digital simulation tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
